subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Is Alexandre Vinokourov telling the truth when he insists that his victory in the Liège-Bastogne-Liège bicycle racing classic had nothing to do with doping?
snippet: Is Alexandre Vinokourov telling the truth when he insists that his victory in the Liège-Bastogne-Liège bicycle racing classic had nothing to do with doping?
